slots.name: avatar
slots.description: Use the #avatar slot to customize the link avatar. You will have access to the link and isActive properties in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #avatar 槽自定义链接头像。您将有权访问槽作用域中的 link 和 isActive 属性。

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Use the #icon slot to customize the link icon. You will have access to the link and isActive properties in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #icon 槽自定义链接图标。您将有权访问槽作用域中的 link 和 isActive 属性。

slots.name: badge
slots.description: Use the #badge slot to customize the link badge. You will have access to the link and isActive properties in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #badge 槽自定义链接徽章。您将有权访问槽作用域中的 link 和 isActive 属性。
